text: Malvaglia was a municipality of the district Blenio in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 1 April 2012, the former municipalities of Ludiano, Malvaglia and Semione merged to form the new municipality of Serravalle.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 23 May 2012 The reservoir Bacino di Val Malvaglia is found above the village. == References == == Other websites == Category:Former municipalities of Ticino
title: Malvaglia
